body: The kid was a pig mask, if you see him again call him a lesbian seagull and he'll be sent into a blind rage and charge you, when he gets close throw a handful of salt at him and he'll shrivel up like a snail. Works every time man 👌
At least I still have my cosmic collection of doujins to cheer me up...

I swear I will never forgive Linus Tech Tips for his fucking Linux "challenge." It's now impossible to bring up Linux without someone saying "lol, install Steam XD!!" The FOSS community will literally never live this down. It'll be 2031 and people will STILL be bringing it up. Some kid asked me today if I used Linux. I said yes. He poured gasoline on my cosmic shoes and set them on fire. We're all fucked.
My guy looks like he's in a perpetual state of enlightenment and I vibe with that
Kinda feels like the author was on drugs or something when he wrote the plot for this. Eh, whatever the art is fantastic. Good shit man 👌
@Ahegaofanboy there are much worse things to defend tbf

Ya know sometimes this loli stuff can be nice but this is over board. Me over here trying to tell people that liking lolis ain't pedophilistic while this ends up being what I'm trying to defend, I think I should call it quits xD
This is a good ending for some reason lol
Make a Sequal of this please.
